item.title: Seeking for Tomcat and OpenJDK engineer
item.description: Red Hat Czech is looking for a Quality Engineer that can help us test OpenJDK and Tomcat: The Quality Engineering (QE) team serves as the last gate through which code must pass on its way to public release. The BaseOS QE group performs function, integration, and performance testing on various OpenJDK and Tomcat in Linux distribution. We're currently looking for test engineers who can analyze, report, track defects and maintenance Tomcat container.
